 2|
 3|import android.app.Dialog
 4|import android.content.Context
 5|import android.hardware.Sensor
 6|import android.hardware.SensorEvent
 7|import android.hardware.SensorEventListener
 8|import android.hardware.SensorManager
 9|import android.os.Bundle
 10|import android.os.CountDownTimer
 11|import android.view.LayoutInflater
 12|import android.view.View
 13|import android.view.ViewGroup
 14|import android.widget.*
 15|import androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
 16|import com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 17|import com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
 18|import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth
 19|import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore
 20|import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
 21|import java.util.*
 22|import kotlin.math.sqrt
 23|
 24|class SleepTrackingDialogFragment : DialogFragment(), SensorEventListener {
 25|
 26| private lateinit var etSleepDuration: TextInputEditText
 27| private lateinit var spinnerSleepQuality: Spinner
 28| private lateinit var btnStartManual: MaterialButton
 29| private lateinit var btnAddManual: MaterialButton
 30| private lateinit var tvCurrentTime: TextView
 31| private lateinit var btnClose: ImageButton
 32|
 33| private lateinit var timer: CountDownTimer
 34| private var isTracking = false
 35| private var startTimeMillis: Long = 0
 36|
 37| // Sensors
 38| private lateinit var sensorManager: SensorManager
 39| private var accelerometer: Sensor? = null
 40| private var movementCount = 0
 41| private var lastMovementTime: Long = 0
 42|
 43| // Firebase
 44| private lateinit var auth: FirebaseAuth
 45| private lateinit var firestore: FirebaseFirestore
 46|
 47| override fun onCreateView(
 48| inflater: LayoutInflater,
 49| container: ViewGroup?,
 50| savedInstanceState: Bundle?
 51| ): View? {
 52| val view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.dialog_sleep_tracking, container, false)
 53|
 54| auth = FirebaseAuth.getInstance()
 55| firestore = FirebaseFirestore.getInstance()
 56|
 57| sensorManager = requireContext().getSystemService(Context.SENSOR_SERVICE) as SensorManager
 58| accelerometer = sensorManager.getDefaultSensor(Sensor.TYPE_ACCELEROMETER)
 59|
 60| initializeViews(view)
 61| setupSpinner()
 62| setupClickListeners()
 63| return view
 64| }
 65|
 66| override fun onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState: Bundle?): Dialog {
 67| val dialog = super.onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState)
 68| dialog.setCanceledOnTouchOutside(false)
 69| return dialog
 70| }
 71|
 72| override fun onStart() {
 73| super.onStart()
 74| dialog?.window?.setLayout(
 75| ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT,
 76| ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT
 77| )
 78| dialog?.window?.setBackgroundDrawableResource(android.R.color.transparent)
 79| }
 80|
 81| private fun initializeViews(view: View) {
 82| etSleepDuration = view.findViewById(R.id.et_sleep_duration)
 83| spinnerSleepQuality = view.findViewById(R.id.spinner_sleep_quality)
 84| btnStartManual = view.findViewById(R.id.btn_start_manual)
 85| btnAddManual = view.findViewById(R.id.btn_add_manual)
 86| tvCurrentTime = view.findViewById(R.id.tv_current_time)
 87| btnClose = view.findViewById(R.id.btn_close)
 88|
 89| updateCurrentTime()
 90| }
 91|
 92| private fun setupSpinner() {
 93| val qualityOptions = arrayOf("Excellente", "Bonne", "Moyenne", "Mauvaise", "Trs mauvaise")
 94| val adapter = ArrayAdapter(requireContext(), android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item, qualityOptions)
 95| adapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item)
 96| spinnerSleepQuality.adapter = adapter
 97| }
 98|
 99| private fun setupClickListeners() {
100| btnStartManual.setOnClickListener {
101| if (!isTracking) {
102| startSleepTracking()
103| } else {
104| stopSleepTracking()
105| }
106| }
107|
108| btnAddManual.setOnClickListener {
109| addManualSleepEntry()
110| }
111|
112| btnClose.setOnClickListener {
113| if (isTracking) {
114| stopTimer()
115| stopSensorTracking()
116| isTracking = false
117| }
118| dismiss()
119| }
120| }
121|
122| // --- AUTOMATIC TRACKING LOGIC ---
123|
124| private fun startSleepTracking() {
125| isTracking = true
126| movementCount = 0
127|
128| btnStartManual.text = "Arrter le suivi"
129| btnStartManual.setBackgroundColor(requireContext().getColor(android.R.color.holo_red_dark))
130|
131| // Clear the field and disable input while tracking
132| etSleepDuration.setText("")
133| etSleepDuration.isEnabled = false
134| etSleepDuration.hint = "Suivi en cours..."
135|
136| spinnerSleepQuality.isEnabled = false
137| btnAddManual.isEnabled = false
138|
139| startTimeMillis = System.currentTimeMillis()
140| startTimer()
141| startSensorTracking()
142|
143| Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Suivi auto dmarr.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
144| }
145|
146| private fun stopSleepTracking() {
147| val endTimeMillis = System.currentTimeMillis()
148| isTracking = false
149|
150| btnStartManual.text = "Dmarrer le suivi"
151| btnStartManual.setBackgroundColor(requireContext().getColor(R.color.purple_primary))
152|
153| stopTimer()
154| stopSensorTracking()
155|
156| // --- FIX: CALCULATE AND POPULATE DURATION ---
157| val elapsedTimeMillis = endTimeMillis - startTimeMillis
158| val totalSeconds = (elapsedTimeMillis / 1000).toInt()
159|
160| var hours = totalSeconds / 3600
161| var minutes = (totalSeconds % 3600) / 60
162|
163| // FORCE 1 MINUTE if test is short (so it doesn't show 00:00)
164| if (totalSeconds > 0 && hours == 0 && minutes == 0) {
165| minutes = 1
166| }
167|
168| val durationString = String.format("%02d:%02d", hours, minutes)
169|
170| // Set the text in the EditText
171| etSleepDuration.setText(durationString)
172|
173| // Re-enable fields so user can click "Add"
174| etSleepDuration.isEnabled = true
175| etSleepDuration.hint = getString(R.string.duration_hint)
176| btnAddManual.isEnabled = true
177| spinnerSleepQuality.isEnabled = true
178|
179| // Auto-detect quality based on movements
180| val movementsPerHour = if (hours > 0) movementCount / hours else movementCount
181| val autoQualityIndex = when {
182| movementsPerHour < 5 -> 0
183| movementsPerHour < 15 -> 1
184| movementsPerHour < 30 -> 2
185| movementsPerHour < 50 -> 3
186| else -> 4
187| }
188| spinnerSleepQuality.setSelection(autoQualityIndex)
189|
190| Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Suivi arrt. Dure: $durationString", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
191| }
192|
193| private fun startSensorTracking() {
194| accelerometer?.let {
195| sensorManager.registerListener(this, it, SensorManager.SENSOR_DELAY_NORMAL)
196| }
197| }
198|
199| private fun stopSensorTracking() {
200| sensorManager.unregisterListener(this)
201| }
202|
203| override fun onSensorChanged(event: SensorEvent?) {
204| if (event?.sensor?.type == Sensor.TYPE_ACCELEROMETER) {
205| val x = event.values[0]
206| val y = event.values[1]
207| val z = event.values[2]
208|
209| val gX = x / SensorManager.GRAVITY_EARTH
210| val gY = y / SensorManager.GRAVITY_EARTH
211| val gZ = z / SensorManager.GRAVITY_EARTH
212| val gForce = sqrt(gX * gX + gY * gY + gZ * gZ)
213|
214| if (gForce > 1.1f) {
215| val now = System.currentTimeMillis()
216| if (now - lastMovementTime > 500) {
217| movementCount++
218| lastMovementTime = now
219| }
220| }
221| }
222| }
223|
224| override fun onAccuracyChanged(sensor: Sensor?, accuracy: Int) { }
225|
226| // --- TIMER ---
227|
228| private fun startTimer() {
229| timer = object : CountDownTimer(Long.MAX_VALUE, 1000) {
230| override fun onTick(millisUntilFinished: Long) {
231| val elapsedMillis = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTimeMillis
232| val totalSeconds = (elapsedMillis / 1000).toInt()
233| val hours = totalSeconds / 3600
234| val minutes = (totalSeconds % 3600) / 60
235| val secs = totalSeconds % 60
236| tvCurrentTime.text = String.format("Temps coul: %02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, secs)
237| }
238| override fun onFinish() { }
239| }
240| timer.start()
241| }
242|
243| private fun stopTimer() {
244| if (::timer.isInitialized) {
245| timer.cancel()
246| }
247| updateCurrentTime()
248| }
249|
250| // --- MANUAL ENTRY ---
251|
252| private fun addManualSleepEntry() {
253| val duration = etSleepDuration.text.toString()
254| val quality = spinnerSleepQuality.selectedItem.toString()
255|
256| if (duration.isEmpty()) {
257| etSleepDuration.error = "Requis"
258| return
259| }
260| if (!isValidDurationFormat(duration)) {
261| etSleepDuration.error = "Format HH:MM invalide"
262| return
263| }
264|
265| // Disable buttons immediately to prevent double-click or "not working" feeling
266| btnAddManual.isEnabled = false
267| btnAddManual.text = "..."
268| btnStartManual.isEnabled = false
269|
270| saveSleepData(duration, quality)
271| }
272|
273| private fun isValidDurationFormat(duration: String): Boolean {
274| return duration.matches(Regex("^\\d{1,2}:\\d{2}$"))
275| }
276|
277| private fun saveSleepData(durationStr: String, qualityStr: String) {
278| val user = auth.currentUser
279| if (user == null) {
280| Toast.makeText(context, "Erreur: Non connect", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
281| resetButtons()
282| return
283| }
284|
285| val sharedPref = requireContext().getSharedPreferences("sleep_data", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
286| sharedPref.edit()
287| .putString("last_sleep_date", SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date()))
288| .putString("last_sleep_duration", durationStr)
289| .putString("last_sleep_quality", qualityStr)
290| .apply()
291|
292| val parts = durationStr.split(":")
293| val hours = parts[0].toFloat()
294| val minutes = parts[1].toFloat()
295| val durationFloat = hours + (minutes / 60f)
296|
297| val qualityScore = when(qualityStr) {
298| "Excellente" -> 100
299| "Bonne" -> 80
300| "Moyenne" -> 60
301| "Mauvaise" -> 40
302| else -> 20
303| }
304|
305| val source = if (movementCount > 0) "Capteurs" else "Manuel"
306|
307| val sleepSession = hashMapOf(
308| "date" to System.currentTimeMillis(),
309| "durationString" to durationStr,
310| "durationHours" to durationFloat,
311| "qualityText" to qualityStr,
312| "qualityScore" to qualityScore,
313| "source" to source,
314| "movements" to movementCount
315| )
316|
317| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid)
318| .collection("sleep_sessions")
319| .add(sleepSession)
320| .addOnSuccessListener {
321| if (context != null) {
322| Toast.makeText(context, "Session enregistre !", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
323| dismiss()
324| }
325| }
326| .addOnFailureListener { e ->
327| if (context != null) {
328| Toast.makeText(context, "Erreur: ${e.message}", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
329| resetButtons()
330| }
331| }
332| }
333|
334| private fun resetButtons() {
335| if (context != null) {
336| btnAddManual.isEnabled = true
337| btnAddManual.text = getString(R.string.btn_add_manual)
338| btnStartManual.isEnabled = true
339| }
340| }
341|
342| private fun updateCurrentTime() {
343| val currentTime = SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date())
344| tvCurrentTime.text = "Heure actuelle: $currentTime"
345| }
346|
347| override fun onDestroy() {
348| super.onDestroy()
349| if (isTracking) {
350| stopTimer()
351| stopSensorTracking()
352| }
353| }

 android:layout_width="match_parent"

 <!-- Floating Card Container -->
 <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_gravity="center"
 android:layout_marginHorizontal="20dp"
 app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF"
 app:cardCornerRadius="32dp"
 app:cardElevation="24dp">

 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:padding="28dp">

 <!-- Header Section -->
 <RelativeLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">

 <TextView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="@string/sleep_tracking_title"
 android:textColor="#1A1A1A"
 android:textSize="24sp"
 android:textStyle="bold"
 android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"
 android:layout_centerVertical="true"/>

 <ImageButton
 android:id="@+id/btn_close"
 android:layout_width="40dp"
 android:layout_height="40dp"
 android:src="@drawable/ic_close"
 android:background="@drawable/close_rounded_bg"
 android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
 android:contentDescription="Fermer"
 app:tint="#6B6B6B" />
 </RelativeLayout>

 <!-- Time Display with Soft Background -->
 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:background="@drawable/soft_bg_rounded"
 android:padding="24dp"
 android:gravity="center"
 android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">

 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_current_time"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"

 android:textStyle="bold"
 android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"
 android:gravity="center"
 android:letterSpacing="-0.02"
 android:layout_marginBottom="4dp"/>

 <TextView
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="@string/current_time_label"
 android:textColor="#7A7A7A"
 android:textSize="14sp"
 android:gravity="center"/>
 </LinearLayout>

 <!-- Session Details -->
 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:layout_marginBottom="20dp">

 <TextView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="@string/session_details"
 android:textColor="#4A4A4A"
 android:textSize="13sp"
 android:textStyle="bold"
 android:letterSpacing="0.05"
 android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>

 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"

 <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout

 style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox">

 <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
 android:id="@+id/et_sleep_duration"

 android:inputType="datetime"
 android:maxLines="1"
 android:paddingVertical="14dp"/>
 </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>

 <FrameLayout

 </FrameLayout>
 </LinearLayout>
 </LinearLayout>

 <!-- Primary Action Button -->
 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/btn_start_manual"

 android:textSize="16sp"

 app:cornerRadius="28dp"

 <!-- Hint Text -->
 <TextView

 android:textColor="#9A9A9A"
 android:textSize="12sp"
 android:gravity="center"
 android:lineSpacingExtra="2dp"
 android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>

 <!-- Subtle Divider -->
 <View
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="1dp"
 android:background="#E8E8E8"
 android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>

 <!-- Secondary Action Button -->
 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/btn_add_manual"
 style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="52dp"
 android:text="@string/btn_add_manual"
 android:textColor="#4A90E2"
 android:textSize="15sp"
 android:textStyle="bold"
 app:strokeColor="#4A90E2"
 app:strokeWidth="2dp"
 app:cornerRadius="26dp"
 android:letterSpacing="0.02"/>

 </LinearLayout>
 </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

 3|import android.app.Dialog
 4|import android.content.Context
 5|import android.hardware.Sensor
 6|import android.hardware.SensorEvent
 7|import android.hardware.SensorEventListener
 8|import android.hardware.SensorManager
 9|import android.os.Bundle
 10|import android.os.CountDownTimer
 11|import android.view.LayoutInflater
 12|import android.view.View
 13|import android.view.ViewGroup
 14|import android.widget.*
 15|import androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
 16|import com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 17|import com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
 18|import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth
 19|import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore
 20|import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
 21|import java.util.*
 22|import kotlin.math.sqrt
 23|
 24|class SleepTrackingDialogFragment : DialogFragment(), SensorEventListener {
 25|
 26| private lateinit var etSleepDuration: TextInputEditText
 27| private lateinit var spinnerSleepQuality: Spinner
 28| private lateinit var btnStartManual: MaterialButton
 29| private lateinit var btnAddManual: MaterialButton
 30| private lateinit var tvCurrentTime: TextView
 31| private lateinit var btnClose: ImageButton
 32|
 33| private lateinit var timer: CountDownTimer
 34| private var isTracking = false
 35| private var startTimeMillis: Long = 0
 36|
 37| // Sensors
 38| private lateinit var sensorManager: SensorManager
 39| private var accelerometer: Sensor? = null
 40| private var movementCount = 0
 41| private var lastMovementTime: Long = 0
 42|
 43| // Firebase
 44| private lateinit var auth: FirebaseAuth
 45| private lateinit var firestore: FirebaseFirestore
 46|
 47| override fun onCreateView(
 48| inflater: LayoutInflater,
 49| container: ViewGroup?,
 50| savedInstanceState: Bundle?
 51| ): View? {
 52| val view = inflater.inflate(R.layout.dialog_sleep_tracking, container, false)
 53|
 54| auth = FirebaseAuth.getInstance()
 55| firestore = FirebaseFirestore.getInstance()
 56|
 57| sensorManager = requireContext().getSystemService(Context.SENSOR_SERVICE) as SensorManager
 58| accelerometer = sensorManager.getDefaultSensor(Sensor.TYPE_ACCELEROMETER)
 59|
 60| initializeViews(view)
 61| setupSpinner()
 62| setupClickListeners()
 63| return view
 64| }
 65|
 66| override fun onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState: Bundle?): Dialog {
 67| val dialog = super.onCreateDialog(savedInstanceState)
 68| dialog.setCanceledOnTouchOutside(false)
 69| return dialog
 70| }
 71|
 72| override fun onStart() {
 73| super.onStart()
 74| dialog?.window?.setLayout(
 75| ViewGroup.LayoutParams.MATCH_PARENT,
 76| ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT
 77| )
 78| dialog?.window?.setBackgroundDrawableResource(android.R.color.transparent)
 79| }
 80|
 81| private fun initializeViews(view: View) {
 82| etSleepDuration = view.findViewById(R.id.et_sleep_duration)
 83| spinnerSleepQuality = view.findViewById(R.id.spinner_sleep_quality)
 84| btnStartManual = view.findViewById(R.id.btn_start_manual)
 85| btnAddManual = view.findViewById(R.id.btn_add_manual)
 86| tvCurrentTime = view.findViewById(R.id.tv_current_time)
 87| btnClose = view.findViewById(R.id.btn_close)
 88|
 89| updateCurrentTime()
 90| }
 91|
 92| private fun setupSpinner() {
 93| val qualityOptions = arrayOf("Excellente", "Bonne", "Moyenne", "Mauvaise", "Trs mauvaise")
 94| val adapter = ArrayAdapter(requireContext(), android.R.layout.simple_spinner_item, qualityOptions)
 95| adapter.setDropDownViewResource(android.R.layout.simple_spinner_dropdown_item)
 96| spinnerSleepQuality.adapter = adapter
 97| }
 98|
 99| private fun setupClickListeners() {
100| btnStartManual.setOnClickListener {
101| if (!isTracking) {
102| startSleepTracking()
103| } else {
104| stopSleepTracking()
105| }
106| }
107|
108| btnAddManual.setOnClickListener {
109| addManualSleepEntry()
110| }
111|
112| btnClose.setOnClickListener {
113| if (isTracking) {
114| stopTimer()
115| stopSensorTracking()
116| isTracking = false
117| }
118| dismiss()
119| }
120| }
121|
122| // --- AUTOMATIC TRACKING LOGIC ---
123|
124| private fun startSleepTracking() {
125| isTracking = true
126| movementCount = 0
127|
128| btnStartManual.text = "Arrter le suivi"
129| btnStartManual.setBackgroundColor(requireContext().getColor(android.R.color.holo_red_dark))
130|
131| // Clear the field and disable input while tracking
132| etSleepDuration.setText("")
133| etSleepDuration.isEnabled = false
134| etSleepDuration.hint = "Suivi en cours..."
135|
136| spinnerSleepQuality.isEnabled = false
137| btnAddManual.isEnabled = false
138|
139| startTimeMillis = System.currentTimeMillis()
140| startTimer()
141| startSensorTracking()
142|
143| Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Suivi auto dmarr.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
144| }
145|
146| private fun stopSleepTracking() {
147| val endTimeMillis = System.currentTimeMillis()
148| isTracking = false
149|
150| btnStartManual.text = "Dmarrer le suivi"
151| btnStartManual.setBackgroundColor(requireContext().getColor(R.color.purple_primary))
152|
153| stopTimer()
154| stopSensorTracking()
155|
156| // --- Calculate Duration ---
157| val elapsedTimeMillis = endTimeMillis - startTimeMillis
158| val totalSeconds = (elapsedTimeMillis / 1000).toInt()
159|
160| var hours = totalSeconds / 3600
161| var minutes = (totalSeconds % 3600) / 60
162|
163| // FORCE 1 MINUTE if test is short (so it doesn't show 00:00)
164| if (totalSeconds > 0 && hours == 0 && minutes == 0) {
165| minutes = 1
166| }
167|
168| val durationString = String.format("%02d:%02d", hours, minutes)
169|
170| // --- Auto-detect quality based on movements ---
171| val movementsPerHour = if (hours > 0) movementCount / hours else movementCount
172| val autoQualityIndex = when {
173| movementsPerHour < 5 -> 0
174| movementsPerHour < 15 -> 1
175| movementsPerHour < 30 -> 2
176| movementsPerHour < 50 -> 3
177| else -> 4
178| }
179|
180| // Get quality string
181| val qualityOptions = arrayOf("Excellente", "Bonne", "Moyenne", "Mauvaise", "Trs mauvaise")
182| val qualityString = qualityOptions[autoQualityIndex]
183|
184| // --- Save Automatically ---
185| Toast.makeText(requireContext(), "Suivi arrt. Enregistrement auto...", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT)
186| .show()
187|
188| // Disable buttons
189| btnAddManual.isEnabled = false
190| btnStartManual.isEnabled = false
191|
192| // Save directly
193| saveSleepData(durationString, qualityString)
194| }
195|
196| private fun startSensorTracking() {
197| accelerometer?.let {
198| sensorManager.registerListener(this, it, SensorManager.SENSOR_DELAY_NORMAL)
199| }
200| }
201|
202| private fun stopSensorTracking() {
203| sensorManager.unregisterListener(this)
204| }
205|
206| override fun onSensorChanged(event: SensorEvent?) {
207| if (event?.sensor?.type == Sensor.TYPE_ACCELEROMETER) {
208| val x = event.values[0]
209| val y = event.values[1]
210| val z = event.values[2]
211|
212| val gX = x / SensorManager.GRAVITY_EARTH
213| val gY = y / SensorManager.GRAVITY_EARTH
214| val gZ = z / SensorManager.GRAVITY_EARTH
215| val gForce = sqrt(gX * gX + gY * gY + gZ * gZ)
216|
217| if (gForce > 1.1f) {
218| val now = System.currentTimeMillis()
219| if (now - lastMovementTime > 500) {
220| movementCount++
221| lastMovementTime = now
222| }
223| }
224| }
225| }
226|
227| override fun onAccuracyChanged(sensor: Sensor?, accuracy: Int) { }
228|
229| // --- TIMER ---
230|
231| private fun startTimer() {
232| timer = object : CountDownTimer(Long.MAX_VALUE, 1000) {
233| override fun onTick(millisUntilFinished: Long) {
234| val elapsedMillis = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTimeMillis
235| val totalSeconds = (elapsedMillis / 1000).toInt()
236| val hours = totalSeconds / 3600
237| val minutes = (totalSeconds % 3600) / 60
238| val secs = totalSeconds % 60
239| tvCurrentTime.text = String.format("Temps coul: %02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, secs)
240| }
241| override fun onFinish() { }
242| }
243| timer.start()
244| }
245|
246| private fun stopTimer() {
247| if (::timer.isInitialized) {
248| timer.cancel()
249| }
250| updateCurrentTime()
251| }
252|
253| // --- MANUAL ENTRY ---
254|
255| private fun addManualSleepEntry() {
256| val duration = etSleepDuration.text.toString()
257| val quality = spinnerSleepQuality.selectedItem.toString()
258|
259| if (duration.isEmpty()) {
260| etSleepDuration.error = "Requis"
261| return
262| }
263| if (!isValidDurationFormat(duration)) {
264| etSleepDuration.error = "Format HH:MM invalide"
265| return
266| }
267|
268| // Disable buttons immediately to prevent double-click or "not working" feeling
269| btnAddManual.isEnabled = false
270| btnAddManual.text = "..."
271| btnStartManual.isEnabled = false
272|
273| saveSleepData(duration, quality)
274| }
275|
276| private fun isValidDurationFormat(duration: String): Boolean {
277| return duration.matches(Regex("^\\d{1,2}:\\d{2}$"))
278| }
279|
280| private fun saveSleepData(durationStr: String, qualityStr: String) {
281| val user = auth.currentUser
282| if (user == null) {
283| Toast.makeText(context, "Erreur: Non connect", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
284| resetButtons()
285| return
286| }
287|
288| val sharedPref = requireContext().getSharedPreferences("sleep_data", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
289| sharedPref.edit()
290| .putString("last_sleep_date", SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date()))
291| .putString("last_sleep_duration", durationStr)
292| .putString("last_sleep_quality", qualityStr)
293| .apply()
294|
295| val parts = durationStr.split(":")
296| val hours = parts[0].toFloat()
297| val minutes = parts[1].toFloat()
298| val durationFloat = hours + (minutes / 60f)
299|
300| val qualityScore = when(qualityStr) {
301| "Excellente" -> 100
302| "Bonne" -> 80
303| "Moyenne" -> 60
304| "Mauvaise" -> 40
305| else -> 20
306| }
307|
308| val source = if (movementCount > 0) "Capteurs" else "Manuel"
309|
310| val sleepSession = hashMapOf(
311| "date" to System.currentTimeMillis(),
312| "durationString" to durationStr,
313| "durationHours" to durationFloat,
314| "qualityText" to qualityStr,
315| "qualityScore" to qualityScore,
316| "source" to source,
317| "movements" to movementCount
318| )
319|
320| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid)
321| .collection("sleep_sessions")
322| .add(sleepSession)
323| .addOnSuccessListener {
324| if (context != null) {
325| Toast.makeText(context, "Session enregistre !", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
326| dismiss()
327| }
328| }
329| .addOnFailureListener { e ->
330| if (context != null) {
331| Toast.makeText(context, "Erreur: ${e.message}", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
332| resetButtons()
333| }
334| }
335| }
336|
337| private fun resetButtons() {
338| if (context != null) {
339| btnAddManual.isEnabled = true
340| btnAddManual.text = getString(R.string.btn_add_manual)
341| btnStartManual.isEnabled = true
342| }
343| }
344|
345| private fun updateCurrentTime() {
346| val currentTime = SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date())
347| tvCurrentTime.text = "Heure actuelle: $currentTime"
348| }
349|
350| override fun onDestroy() {
351| super.onDestroy()
352| if (isTracking) {
353| stopTimer()
354| stopSensorTracking()
355| }
356| }

**Changes made:**

1. **Modified `setupSpinner`:**
 - Added "Slectionnez la qualit" as the first item in the spinner.
 - Added an `OnItemSelectedListener` to the spinner. This listener detects when the user selects a quality *after* stopping the tracking and automatically triggers `saveSleepData`.

2. **Updated `stopSleepTracking`:**
 - Removed the automatic quality detection and automatic saving logic.
 - Now, when you stop tracking:
 - The duration is calculated and stored.
 - The spinner is enabled and reset to "Slectionnez la qualit".
 - A message prompts the user to select the quality.
 - The app enters a "waiting" state.

3. **Updated `addManualSleepEntry`:**
 - Added validation to ensure the user cannot manually add an entry with the "Slectionnez la qualit" prompt selected.

Now, when the user clicks "Stop", they will be asked to select the sleep quality (e.g., "Excellente" or "Moyenne"). As soon as they make a selection, the session is automatically saved to the system without needing to click "Add" manually.

**Summary of changes:**
1. **Removed the conflicting hint:** In `startSleepTracking`, I removed the line setting the hint to "Suivi en cours...", which was causing the visual overlap with the "Duration" label.
2. **Initialized with text:** The field now initializes with "00:00:00" when tracking starts. This forces the "Duration" label to float correctly.
3. **Live Counter:** Updated the timer's `onTick` method to set the text of `etSleepDuration` to the elapsed time (e.g., "00:01:23") every second. This ensures the user sees the counter right in the input field.
4. **Final Duration Display:** In `stopSleepTracking`, the field is updated one last time with the final formatted duration (e.g., "08:30") before prompting for quality selection.

This should resolve the "text problem" and ensure the counter is visible where the user expects it.

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/aymenzemrani/sleeptrackerapp/SleepTrackingDialogFragment.kt

 override fun onTick(millisUntilFinished: Long) {
// ... existing code ...
 val timeString = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, secs)
 tvCurrentTime.text = "Temps coul: $timeString"
 etSleepDuration.setText(timeString)
 }
// ... existing code ...

 3|import android.animation.ValueAnimator

 6|import android.os.Bundle

 8|import android.widget.ImageView
 9|import android.widget.LinearLayout

 12|import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat

 14|import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
 15|import androidx.viewpager2.adapter.FragmentStateAdapter
 16|import androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2
 17|import com.google.android.gms.wearable.DataClient
 18|import com.google.android.gms.wearable.DataEvent
 19|import com.google.android.gms.wearable.DataEventBuffer
 20|import com.google.android.gms.wearable.DataMapItem
 21|import com.google.android.gms.wearable.Wearable
 22|import com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth
 23|import com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore
 24|import java.text.SimpleDateFormat
 25|import java.util.Date
 26|import java.util.Locale
 27|
 28|class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity(), AccountFragment.LogoutListener, DataClient.OnDataChangedListener {
 29|
 30| private lateinit var auth: FirebaseAuth
 31| private lateinit var firestore: FirebaseFirestore
 32| private lateinit var navBar: LinearLayout
 33| private lateinit var selectedBackground: LinearLayout
 34| private lateinit var viewPager: ViewPager2
 35|
 36| private lateinit var moonIcon: ImageView
 37| private lateinit var bellIcon: ImageView
 38| private lateinit var musicIcon: ImageView
 39| private lateinit var statsIcon: ImageView
 40|
 41| private var selectedPosition = 0
 42|
 43| override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 44| super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 45| LocaleHelper.loadLocale(this)
 46| setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
 47|
 48|
 49| auth = FirebaseAuth.getInstance()
 50| firestore = FirebaseFirestore.getInstance()
 51|
 52|
 53| // Bind Views
 54| viewPager = findViewById(R.id.viewPager)
 55| navBar = findViewById(R.id.navBar)
 56| selectedBackground = findViewById(R.id.selectedBackground)
 57|
 58| moonIcon = findViewById(R.id.moonIcon)
 59| bellIcon = findViewById(R.id.bellIcon)
 60| musicIcon = findViewById(R.id.musicIcon)
 61| statsIcon = findViewById(R.id.statsIcon)
 62|
 63| setupViewPager()
 64| setupClickListeners()
 65|
 66| moonIcon.post {
 67| moveBackgroundTo(moonIcon, animate = false)
 68| updateIconColors()
 69| }
 70| }
 71|
 72| // --- WEAR OS LISTENER ---
 73| override fun onResume() {
 74| super.onResume()
 75| // Start listening for watch data
 76| Wearable.getDataClient(this).addListener(this)
 77| }
 78|
 79| override fun onPause() {
 80| super.onPause()
 81| // Stop listening to save battery
 82| Wearable.getDataClient(this).removeListener(this)
 83| }
 84|
 85| // This function runs when the watch sends data
 86| override fun onDataChanged(dataEvents: DataEventBuffer) {
 87| for (event in dataEvents) {
 88| if (event.type == DataEvent.TYPE_CHANGED && event.dataItem.uri.path == "/sleep_data") {
 89| val dataMap = DataMapItem.fromDataItem(event.dataItem).dataMap
 90|
 91| // 1. Get raw data from Watch
 92| val durationSeconds = dataMap.getLong("duration")
 93| val movements = dataMap.getInt("movements")
 94| val timestamp = dataMap.getLong("timestamp")
 95|
 96| // 2. Process data (Same logic as your Manual Method)
 97| processAndSaveWatchData(durationSeconds, movements, timestamp)
 98| }
 99| }
100| }
101|
102| private fun processAndSaveWatchData(durationSec: Long, movements: Int, timestamp: Long) {
103| val user = auth.currentUser ?: return
104|
105| // Calculate Hours and Minutes
106| val hours = durationSec / 3600
107| val minutes = (durationSec % 3600) / 60
108| val durationFloat = hours + (minutes / 60f)
109| val durationString = String.format("%02d:%02d", hours, minutes)
110|
111| // Calculate Quality (Based on movements per hour)
112| val movementsPerHour = if (hours > 0) movements / hours else movements.toLong()
113| val (qualityText, qualityScore) = when {
114| movementsPerHour < 5 -> "Excellente" to 100
115| movementsPerHour < 15 -> "Bonne" to 80
116| movementsPerHour < 30 -> "Moyenne" to 60
117| movementsPerHour < 50 -> "Mauvaise" to 40
118| else -> "Trs mauvaise" to 20
119| }
120|
121| // 3. SAVE LOCAL (For "Dernire nuit" / Last Night display)
122| val sharedPref = getSharedPreferences("sleep_data", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
123| sharedPref.edit()
124| .putString("last_sleep_date", SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd", Locale.getDefault()).format(Date()))
125| .putString("last_sleep_duration", durationString)
126| .putString("last_sleep_quality", qualityText)
127| .apply()
128|
129| // 4. SAVE TO FIREBASE (For Charts)
130| val sleepSession = hashMapOf(
131| "date" to timestamp,
132| "durationString" to durationString,
133| "durationHours" to durationFloat,
134| "qualityText" to qualityText,
135| "qualityScore" to qualityScore,
136| "source" to "Smart Watch", // Mark source as Watch
137| "movements" to movements
138| )
139|
140| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid)
141| .collection("sleep_sessions")
142| .add(sleepSession)
143| .addOnSuccessListener {
144| runOnUiThread {
145| Toast.makeText(this, "Donnes de la montre reues et sauvegardes !", Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()
146| // Refresh UI if on dashboard
147| viewPager.adapter?.notifyDataSetChanged()
148| }
149| }
150| }
151| // --- END WEAR OS LOGIC ---
152|
153| private fun setupViewPager() {
154| val adapter = MainPagerAdapter(this)
155| viewPager.adapter = adapter
156| viewPager.registerOnPageChangeCallback(object : ViewPager2.OnPageChangeCallback() {
157| override fun onPageSelected(position: Int) {
158| if (position != selectedPosition) {
159| val icon = getIconForPosition(position)
160| selectedPosition = position
161| moveBackgroundTo(icon, animate = true)
162| updateIconColors()
163| animateIconBounce(icon)
164| }
165| }
166| })
167| }
168|
169| private fun setupClickListeners() {
170| moonIcon.setOnClickListener { viewPager.currentItem = 0 }
171| bellIcon.setOnClickListener { viewPager.currentItem = 1 }
172| musicIcon.setOnClickListener { viewPager.currentItem = 2 }
173| statsIcon.setOnClickListener { viewPager.currentItem = 3 }
174| }
175|
176| private fun getIconForPosition(position: Int): ImageView {
177| return when (position) {
178| 0 -> moonIcon
179| 1 -> bellIcon
180| 2 -> musicIcon
181| 3 -> statsIcon
182| else -> moonIcon
183| }
184| }
185|
186| private fun animateIconBounce(icon: ImageView) {
187| icon.animate().scaleX(1.2f).scaleY(1.2f).setDuration(150).withEndAction {
188| icon.animate().scaleX(1f).scaleY(1f).setDuration(150).start()
189| }.start()
190| }
191|
192| private fun updateIconColors() {
193| val icons = listOf(moonIcon, bellIcon, musicIcon, statsIcon)
194| icons.forEachIndexed { index, icon ->
195| if (index == selectedPosition) {
196| icon.setColorFilter(ContextCompat.getColor(this, android.R.color.white))
197| } else {
198| icon.setColorFilter(ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.icon_unselected))
199| }
200| }
201| }

203| private fun moveBackgroundTo(targetView: ImageView, animate: Boolean) {
204| val targetX = targetView.x + (targetView.width / 2) - (selectedBackground.width / 2)
205| if (animate) {
206| val animator = ValueAnimator.ofFloat(selectedBackground.x, targetX)
207| animator.duration = 400
208| animator.interpolator = OvershootInterpolator(1.4f)
209| animator.addUpdateListener { animation ->
210| selectedBackground.x = animation.animatedValue as Float
211| }
212| animator.start()
213| } else {
214| selectedBackground.x = targetX
215| }
216| }

146| // --- NEW FUNCTION FOR STARS ---
147| private fun setupStarryBackground(view: View) {
148| val container = view.findViewById<FrameLayout>(R.id.star_container)
149| if (container == null) return
150|
151| // Use post to wait for layout measurement
152| container.post {
153| val width = container.width
154| val height = container.height
155| val random = Random()
156|
157| // Create 50 stars
158| for (i in 0 until 50) {
159| val star = View(context)
160|
161| // 1. White Circle Shape
162| val drawable = GradientDrawable()
163| drawable.shape = GradientDrawable.OVAL
164| drawable.setColor(Color.WHITE)
165| star.background = drawable
166|
167| // 2. Random Size (2dp to 5dp)
168| val density = resources.displayMetrics.density
169| val size = ((2..5).random() * density).toInt()
170| val params = FrameLayout.LayoutParams(size, size)
171|
172| // 3. Random Position
173| params.leftMargin = random.nextInt(width)
174| params.topMargin = random.nextInt(height)
175| star.layoutParams = params
176|
177| // 4. Add to layout
178| container.addView(star)
179|
180| // 5. Animation (Fade In/Out)
181| star.alpha = random.nextFloat()
182| val animator = ObjectAnimator.ofFloat(star, "alpha", 0.2f, 1f, 0.2f)
183| animator.duration = (1500..4000).random().toLong()
184| animator.startDelay = (0..2000).random().toLong()
185| animator.repeatCount = ValueAnimator.INFINITE
186| animator.repeatMode = ValueAnimator.REVERSE
187| animator.start()
188| }
189| }
190| }

320| private fun exportDataToCsv() {
321| val user = auth.currentUser ?: return
322| Toast.makeText(context, getString(R.string.csv_generating), Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
323|
324| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid).collection("sleep_sessions")
325| .orderBy("date", Query.Direction.DESCENDING)
326| .get()
327| .addOnSuccessListener { documents ->
328| try {
329| val fileName = "sleep_export.csv"
330| val file = File(requireContext().cacheDir, fileName)
331| val writer = FileWriter(file)
332|
333| writer.append("Date,Time,Duration (h),Quality,Movements,Source\n")
334| val dateFormat = SimpleDateFormat("dd/MM/yyyy", Locale.US)
335| val timeFormat = SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm", Locale.US)
336|
337| for (doc in documents) {
338| val dateMillis = doc.getLong("date") ?: 0L
339| val dateStr = dateFormat.format(Date(dateMillis))
340| val timeStr = timeFormat.format(Date(dateMillis))
341| val duration = doc.getDouble("durationHours") ?: 0.0
342| val quality = doc.getString("qualityText") ?: "N/A"
343| val movements = doc.getLong("movements") ?: 0
344| val source = doc.getString("source") ?: "Manual"
345| writer.append("$dateStr,$timeStr,$duration,$quality,$movements,$source\n")
346| }
347| writer.flush()
348| writer.close()
349| shareFile(file, "text/csv", getString(R.string.export_csv))
350| } catch (e: Exception) {
351| Toast.makeText(context, getString(R.string.error_export), Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
352| }
353| }
354| }
355|
356| private fun performEncryptedBackup() {
357| val user = auth.currentUser ?: return
358| Toast.makeText(context, getString(R.string.backup_encrypting), Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
359|
360| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid).collection("sleep_sessions")
361| .get()
362| .addOnSuccessListener { documents ->
363| try {
364| val dataList = documents.map { it.data }
365| val jsonString = Gson().toJson(dataList)
366| val fileName = "backup_secure_${System.currentTimeMillis()}.enc"
367| val file = File(requireContext().filesDir, fileName)
368| if(file.exists()) file.delete()
369|
370| val mainKey = MasterKey.Builder(requireContext())
371| .setKeyScheme(MasterKey.KeyScheme.AES256_GCM)
372| .build()
373|
374| val encryptedFile = EncryptedFile.Builder(
375| requireContext(),
376| file,
377| mainKey,
378| EncryptedFile.FileEncryptionScheme.AES256_GCM_HKDF_4KB
379| ).build()
380|
381| val outputStream = encryptedFile.openFileOutput()
382| outputStream.write(jsonString.toByteArray(Charsets.UTF_8))
383| outputStream.flush()
384| outputStream.close()
385| shareFile(file, "application/octet-stream", getString(R.string.backup_encrypted))
386| } catch (e: Exception) {
387| Toast.makeText(context, "Error: ${e.message}", Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()
388| }
389| }
390| }
391|
392| private fun shareFile(file: File, mimeType: String, title: String) {
393| try {
394| val authority = "${requireContext().packageName}.provider"
395| val uri = FileProvider.getUriForFile(requireContext(), authority, file)
396| val intent = Intent(Intent.ACTION_SEND).apply {
397| type = mimeType
398| putExtra(Intent.EXTRA_STREAM, uri)
399| putExtra(Intent.EXTRA_SUBJECT, title)
400| addFlags(Intent.FLAG_GRANT_READ_URI_PERMISSION)
401| }
402| startActivity(Intent.createChooser(intent, title))
403| } catch (e: Exception) {
404| Toast.makeText(context, "Share failed.", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
405| }
406| }

413| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid).get()

416| }
417| firestore.collection("users").document(user.uid).collection("goals")
418| .orderBy("dateCreated", Query.Direction.DESCENDING).limit(1).get()
419| .addOnSuccessListener { docs ->
420| if (!docs.isEmpty) {
421| tvDailyGoal.text = "${docs.documents[0].getDouble("duration")}h"
422| }
423| }
424| }
425| }

429| logoutListener = null

 3|import android.content.Context

 5|import androidx.core.app.NotificationManagerCompat
 6|import androidx.work.*
 7|import java.util.Calendar
 8|import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit
 9|
10|class WakeUpWorker(val context: Context, params: WorkerParameters) : CoroutineWorker(context, params) {
11| override suspend fun doWork(): Result {
12| sendWakeUpNotification()
13| return Result.success()
14| }
15|
16| private fun sendWakeUpNotification() {
17| val channelId = "sleep_reminders"
18| val notificationId = 1002
19|
20| val builder = NotificationCompat.Builder(context, channelId)
21| .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_moon) // Assurez-vous d'avoir cette icne
22| .setContentTitle("Bonjour ! ")
23| .setContentText("C'est l'heure de se lever !")
24| .setPriority(NotificationCompat.PRIORITY_HIGH)
25| .setAutoCancel(true)
26|
27| try {
28| NotificationManagerCompat.from(context).notify(notificationId, builder.build())
29| } catch (e: SecurityException) { e.printStackTrace() }
30| }
31|}
32|
33|fun scheduleWakeUpReminder(context: Context, hour: Int, minute: Int) {
34| val workManager = WorkManager.getInstance(context)
35| val now = Calendar.getInstance()
36| val target = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
37| set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, hour)
38| set(Calendar.MINUTE, minute)
39| set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
40| if (before(now)) {
41| add(Calendar.DAY_OF_YEAR, 1)
42| }
43| }
44|
45| val initialDelay = target.timeInMillis - now.timeInMillis
46|
47| val request = PeriodicWorkRequestBuilder<WakeUpWorker>(24, TimeUnit.HOURS)
48| .setInitialDelay(initialDelay, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
49| .addTag("wake_up_tag")
50| .build()
51|
52| workManager.enqueueUniquePeriodicWork(
53| "DailyWakeUpReminder",
54| ExistingPeriodicWorkPolicy.UPDATE,
55| request
56| )

com.aymenzemrani.sleeptrackerapp\n\nimport android.app.NotificationChannel\nimport android.app.NotificationManager\nimport android.app.PendingIntent\nimport android.content.BroadcastReceiver\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.content.Intent\nimport android.media.RingtoneManager\nimport android.os.Build\nimport androidx.core.app.NotificationCompat\n\nclass AlarmReceiver : BroadcastReceiver() {\n override fun onReceive(context: Context, intent: Intent) {\n val notificationManager = context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) as NotificationManager\n val channelId = \"sleep_alarm_channel\"\n\n // Create channel if needed\n if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O) {\n val channel = NotificationChannel(\n channelId,\n \"Alarmes de rveil\",\n NotificationManager.IMPORTANCE_HIGH\n ).apply {\n description = \"Canal pour les alarmes de rveil\"\n enableVibration(true)\n setSound(\n RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM),\n android.media.AudioAttributes.Builder()\n .setUsage(android.media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM)\n .setContentType(android.media.AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION)\n .build()\n )\n }\n notificationManager.createNotificationChannel(channel)\n }\n\n // Open app on click\n val openIntent = Intent(context, MainActivity::class.java).apply {\n flags = Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK or Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK\n }\n val pendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(\n context,\n 0,\n openIntent,\n PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE\n )\n\n // Build notification\n val notification = NotificationCompat.Builder(context, channelId)\n .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_moon) // Make sure this icon exists\n .setContentTitle(\"Alarme Rveil \")\n .setContentText(\"C'est l'heure de se lever !\")\n .setPriority(NotificationCompat.PRIORITY_HIGH)\n .setCategory(NotificationCompat.CATEGORY_ALARM)\n .setAutoCancel(true)\n .setContentIntent(pendingIntent)\n .setSound(RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM))\n .setVibrate(longArrayOf(0, 1000, 500, 1000))\n .build()\n\n notificationManager.notify(2001, notification)\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"","content":"Successfully created file at app/src/main/java/com/aymenzemrani/sleeptrackerapp/AlarmReceiver.kt

com.aymenzemrani.sleeptrackerapp\n\nimport android.app.AlarmManager\nimport android.app.PendingIntent\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.content.Intent\nimport android.os.Build\nimport android.widget.Toast\nimport java.util.Calendar\n\n// We use AlarmManager now for precise \"Alarm\" behavior instead of WorkManager\nfun scheduleWakeUpReminder(context: Context, hour: Int, minute: Int) {\n val alarmManager = context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) as AlarmManager\n val intent = Intent(context, AlarmReceiver::class.java)\n\n val pendingIntent = PendingIntent.getBroadcast(\n context,\n 1002, // ID for WakeUp\n intent,\n PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE\n )\n\n val now = Calendar.getInstance()\n val target = Calendar.getInstance().apply {\n set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, hour)\n set(Calendar.MINUTE, minute)\n set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)\n set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)\n if (before(now)) {\n add(Calendar.DAY_OF_YEAR, 1)\n }\n }\n\n try {\n if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S) {\n if (alarmManager.canScheduleExactAlarms()) {\n alarmManager.setAlarmClock(\n AlarmManager.AlarmClockInfo(target.timeInMillis, pendingIntent),\n pendingIntent\n )\n } else {\n // Fallback or just standard alarm\n alarmManager.setExactAndAllowWhileIdle(AlarmManager.RTC_WAKEUP, target.timeInMillis, pendingIntent)\n }\n } else {\n alarmManager.setAlarmClock(\n AlarmManager.AlarmClockInfo(target.timeInMillis, pendingIntent),\n pendingIntent\n )\n }\n } catch (e: SecurityException) {\n e.printStackTrace()\n Toast.makeText(context, \"Erreur permission alarme\", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()\n }\n}\n\nfun cancelWakeUpReminder(context: Context) {\n val alarmManager = context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) as AlarmManager\n val intent = Intent(context, AlarmReceiver::class.java)\n val pendingIntent = PendingIntent.getBroadcast(\n context,\n 1002,\n [Showing results with pagination = limit: 100, offset: 0]"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I have upgraded the "Wake Up Time" feature in the settings to function as a real Alarm clock.

**Changes made:**

1. **Created `AlarmReceiver.kt`:** This new component handles the alarm event. When the alarm triggers, it:
 - Plays the system default **Alarm Sound** (instead of a notification sound).
 - Vibrates the phone.
 - Shows a high-priority notification ("Alarme Rveil ").
 - Opens the app when tapped.

2. **Updated `WakeUpWorker.kt`:**
 - Replaced the notification-only `WorkManager` logic with **`AlarmManager`**.
 - Implemented `setAlarmClock` (on supported devices) or `setExactAndAllowWhileIdle` to ensure the alarm rings at the precise minute, even if the phone is in Doze mode.
 - Added `cancelWakeUpReminder` to properly turn off the alarm.

3. **Modified `AccountFragment.kt`:**
 - Updated the logic to correctly cancel the alarm using the new `AlarmManager` method when you disable notifications or change the time.

4. **Updated `AndroidManifest.xml`:**
 - Added necessary permissions: `SCHEDULE_EXACT_ALARM` and `VIBRATE`.
 - Registered the `AlarmReceiver`.

Now, when you set a "Wake Up" time in the settings (Account tab), it will schedule a reliable system alarm that will ring and vibrate at the chosen time.

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/aymenzemrani/sleeptrackerapp/WakeUpWorker.kt

 )

import android.app.NotificationChannel
import android.app.NotificationManager
import android.app.PendingIntent
import android.content.BroadcastReceiver
import android.content.Context
import android.content.Intent
import android.media.RingtoneManager
import android.os.Build
import androidx.core.app.NotificationCompat

class AlarmReceiver : BroadcastReceiver() {
 override fun onReceive(context: Context, intent: Intent) {
 val notificationManager =
 context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) as NotificationManager
 val channelId = "sleep_alarm_channel"

 // Create channel if needed
 if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O) {
 val channel = NotificationChannel(
 channelId,
 "Alarmes de rveil",
 NotificationManager.IMPORTANCE_HIGH
 ).apply {
 description = "Canal pour les alarmes de rveil"
 enableVibration(true)
 setSound(
 RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM),
 android.media.AudioAttributes.Builder()
 .setUsage(android.media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM)
 .setContentType(android.media.AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION)
 .build()
 )
 }
 notificationManager.createNotificationChannel(channel)
 }

 // Open app on click
 val openIntent = Intent(context, MainActivity::class.java).apply {
 flags = Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK or Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK
 }
 val pendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 context,
 0,
 openIntent,
 PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 )

 // Build notification
 val notification = NotificationCompat.Builder(context, channelId)
 .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_moon) // Make sure this icon exists
 .setContentTitle("Alarme Rveil ")
 .setContentText("C'est l'heure de se lever !")
 .setPriority(NotificationCompat.PRIORITY_HIGH)
 .setCategory(NotificationCompat.CATEGORY_ALARM)
 .setAutoCancel(true)
 .setContentIntent(pendingIntent)
 .setSound(RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM))
 .setVibrate(longArrayOf(0, 1000, 500, 1000))
 .build()

 notificationManager.notify(2001, notification)
 }
}

**Detailed Fixes:**

1. **Corrected `AlarmManager` Setup:**
 - In `WakeUpWorker.kt`, I updated the `setAlarmClock` call. It now correctly uses two separate intents:
 - One to **wake up the system** (BroadcastReceiver).
 - One to **show the UI** (Activity), which is required by the Android system for proper "Alarm Clock" behavior.
 - This ensures the system treats it as a high-priority alarm, even in Doze mode.

2. **Added Visual Feedback:**
 - When you set the alarm time, a `Toast` message now confirms the exact time it is set for (e.g., "Alarme rgle pour 07:00"). This helps verify it's actually scheduled.

3. **Added Reliable Sound Playback:**
 - In `AlarmReceiver.kt`, I added code to **manually play the ringtone** immediately when the alarm triggers.
 - This acts as a backup: even if the notification banner is hidden or silent due to system settings, the alarm sound will still play using the `RingtoneManager`.
 - The sound is set to stop automatically after 30 seconds to save battery.

**To test it:**
1. Go to the **Account** tab.
2. Tap on **Wake Up Time** and select a time 1 or 2 minutes from now.
3. You should see a "Toast" message confirming the time.
4. Lock your screen and wait. The alarm should ring and vibrate.

```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/aymenzemrani/sleeptrackerapp/AlarmReceiver.kt

import androidx.core.app.NotificationCompat

class AlarmReceiver : BroadcastReceiver() {
 override fun onReceive(context: Context, intent: Intent) {
 val notificationManager =
 context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) as NotificationManager
 val channelId = "sleep_alarm_channel"

 // Play Sound Manually as Backup (in case notification sound fails)
 try {
 val alarmUri: Uri = RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM)
 val ringtone = RingtoneManager.getRingtone(context, alarmUri)
 if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.P) {
 ringtone.isLooping = true
 }
 ringtone.audioAttributes = AudioAttributes.Builder()
 .setUsage(AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM)
 .setContentType(AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION)
 .build()
 ringtone.play()

 // Stop after 30 seconds to save battery
 android.os.Handler(android.os.Looper.getMainLooper()).postDelayed({
 if (ringtone.isPlaying) ringtone.stop()
 }, 30000)

 } catch (e: Exception) {
 e.printStackTrace()
 }

 // Create channel if needed
 if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O) {
 val channel = NotificationChannel(
 channelId,
 "Alarmes de rveil",
 NotificationManager.IMPORTANCE_HIGH
 ).apply {
 description = "Canal pour les alarmes de rveil"
 enableVibration(true)
 setSound(
 RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM),
 android.media.AudioAttributes.Builder()
 .setUsage(android.media.AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM)
 .setContentType(android.media.AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION)
 .build()
 )
 }
 notificationManager.createNotificationChannel(channel)
 }

 // Open app on click
 val openIntent = Intent(context, MainActivity::class.java).apply {
 flags = Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK or Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK
 }
 val pendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 context,
 0,
 openIntent,
 PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 )

 // Build notification
 val notification = NotificationCompat.Builder(context, channelId)
 .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_moon) // Make sure this icon exists
 .setContentTitle("Alarme Rveil ")
 .setContentText("C'est l'heure de se lever !")
 .setPriority(NotificationCompat.PRIORITY_HIGH)
 .setCategory(NotificationCompat.CATEGORY_ALARM)
 .setAutoCancel(true)
 .setContentIntent(pendingIntent)
 .setSound(RingtoneManager.getDefaultUri(RingtoneManager.TYPE_ALARM))
 .setVibrate(longArrayOf(0, 1000, 500, 1000))
 .build()

 notificationManager.notify(2001, notification)
 }
}

 <TextView

 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"

 <TextView

 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"

 <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_weight="1"
 android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"
 app:hintTextColor="#5A5A6B"
 app:boxStrokeColor="#B4B0FF"

 <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText
 android:id="@+id/et_sleep_duration"

 android:textColor="#FFFFFF"

 <FrameLayout
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_height="56dp"

 android:layout_height="match_parent"

 </FrameLayout>
 </LinearLayout>
 </LinearLayout>

 <LinearLayout
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:orientation="vertical">

 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/btn_start_manual"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="60dp"
 android:text="@string/btn_start_tracking"
 android:textColor="#FFFFFF"
 android:textSize="16sp"
 android:textStyle="bold"
 app:backgroundTint="#B4B0FF"
 app:cornerRadius="16dp"
 android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>

 <TextView
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:text="@string/sensor_hint"
 android:textColor="#5A5A6B"
 android:textSize="12sp"
 android:gravity="center"
 android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>

 <View
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="1dp"
 android:background="#2A2A3A"
 android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>

 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/btn_add_manual"
 style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="56dp"
 android:text="@string/btn_add_manual"
 android:textColor="#B4B0FF"
 app:strokeColor="#B4B0FF"
 app:strokeWidth="1dp"
 app:cornerRadius="16dp"/>

 </LinearLayout>

11|// We use AlarmManager now for precise "Alarm" behavior instead of WorkManager
12|fun scheduleWakeUpReminder(context: Context, hour: Int, minute: Int) {
13| val alarmManager = context.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) as AlarmManager
14| val intent = Intent(context, AlarmReceiver::class.java)
15|
16| val operationPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getBroadcast(
17| context,
18| 1002, // ID for WakeUp
19| intent,
20| PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
21| )
22|
23| // Intent to open the app (required for setAlarmClock)
24| val showIntent = Intent(context, MainActivity::class.java)
25| val showPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
26| context,
27| 123,
28| showIntent,
29| PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
30| )
31|
32| val now = Calendar.getInstance()
33| val target = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
34| set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, hour)
35| set(Calendar.MINUTE, minute)
36| set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
37| set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
38| if (before(now)) {
39| add(Calendar.DAY_OF_YEAR, 1)
40| }
41| }
42|
43| try {
44| if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S) {
45| if (alarmManager.canScheduleExactAlarms()) {
46| alarmManager.setAlarmClock(
47| AlarmManager.AlarmClockInfo(target.timeInMillis, showPendingIntent),
48| operationPendingIntent
49| )
50| } else {
51| alarmManager.setExactAndAllowWhileIdle(
52| AlarmManager.RTC_WAKEUP,
53| target.timeInMillis,
54| operationPendingIntent
55| )
56| }
57| } else {
58| alarmManager.setAlarmClock(
59| AlarmManager.AlarmClockInfo(target.timeInMillis, showPendingIntent),
60| operationPendingIntent
61| )
62| }
63|
64| // Feedback to user
65| val dateFormat = java.text.SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm", java.util.Locale.getDefault())
66| Toast.makeText(
67| context,
68| "Alarme rgle pour ${dateFormat.format(target.time)}",
69| Toast.LENGTH_SHORT
70| ).show()
71|
72| } catch (e: SecurityException) {
73| e.printStackTrace()
74| Toast.makeText(context, "Erreur permission alarme", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
75| }
